Summary: We stayed at the Los Alamitos Best Western over President’s Weekend while attending The CaliVibes Music festival in downtown Long Beach.  We enjoyed our stay.  Both the property and staff met expectations for the brand and price point.  The room was average sized, comfortable for two adults and offered a mini fridge, coffee maker, etc. I really appreciated the quality of the mattress and slept well throughout the stay.    Breakfast was included in the rate and offered a good selection of items including eggs, sausage, waffles, assorted breads & condiments, prepackaged pastries, fruit, yogurt, coffee, tea and juice.   I’d definitely recommend to anyone looking for a clean and affordable option that’s convenient to both Long Beach and Orange County.

Summary Heading: On my way to Palm Springs
Summary: This is the second time I stayed at the Los Alamitos Inn.  The first stay, the Inn hosted a girls soccer team.  This time it was a Wedding party.  Several generations of family members in the breakfast room.  Great to see.  Front desk accommodated a business need even though the lobby/breakfast room was bustling with guests.  Good Job to front desk and housekeeping.
Manager Response: Good morning Kathleen K, We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate you always choosing our hotel when staying in the Los Alamitos area. We hope to see you again soon, have a great day.

Summary: The hotel is in a very nice quiet area, about 25miles from the airport, easy to get to, enough parking, VERY helpful and pleasant staff! The rooms are big, clean and well equipt, the plumbing was maybe a tiny bit noisy at times, but otherwise nothing at all to complain about! Pool was nice, hot tub great! There were a number of very good restaurants with-in walking distance, 'especially the Shenandoah across the road!! And the marvellous collection of little gift store there! Everyone in the area was so pleasant! Highly recommended! If u need a place to crash for one night after arriving in the US, choose this, you won't regret it!
Manager Response: Good morning Puddingwife, we appreciate your feedback regarding your visit. Constructive criticism goes a very long way! We hope you have a great day and we hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: The room was very clean and well presented.  The bed was quite comfortable.  The breakfast was good with eggs, potatoes, sausage and a selection of breads.  All presented nicely. The staff were friendly and helpful.  The surrounding area of the hotel gave you a feeling of security.  I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for reviewing your stay with us, johnandgermainec, we appreciate the time it took to do so. We are so happy to hear you were able to enjoy our breakfast! Have a wonderful evening.

Summary: Stayed her before going to another town.  Nice location, rooms are clean up to date and comfortable. If your in the area on a budget stay here, it's ranked number one for a reason! Close to restaurants and stores.
Manager Response: Hello, thank you so much for taking the time to review your most recent stay. Hearing guests love the experience makes it all worth it. We hope you have a great weekend!

Summary: The rooms are clean and the staff is great!  I needed a place to stay while my condo was under construction and they made my stay really exceptional.  For those of you who are from out of town, it is close to Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm, the beach, Long Beach Aquarium, restaurants, shopping,  the whole Los Angeles experience is close by.
Manager Response: Thank you aquajetart for reviewing our hotel's performance during your stay. We are ecstatic to hear you enjoyed your stay. We hope you have a great day, and wonderful holidays!

Summary Heading: Quick overnight trip to Long Beach area
Summary: Staff was great!  Room was clean and modern.  Would return to stay if in area again for a night.  Parking is pretty ridiculous, but the staff does everything in their power to address it, and get creative on where to park.  The only down side was having to go and move the car again at 7am.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review AndyECV, we appreciate constructive criticism. We hope the creative solutions show how much thought we have put into alleviating guest stress over the unfixable issues. Have a great day!

Summary Heading: Good value in an above-average hotel
Summary: We spent one night in this Best Western and it was a good experience. Pros: Clean, comfortable bed, free wifi, breakfast and parking. Cons: $100 was charged in advance to our debit card to hold in event of damage. In spite of this disconcerting experience, we'd stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for giving us valuable feedback about your visit with us here in Los Alamitos. We are glad that you enjoyed all our amenities we have worked so hard to deliver to all our guests. Have a great day!

Summary: Woke up with headache and cough due to a broken air conditioner. The staff had us stay in the room even though the floor was saturated and moldy. Water pressure was terrible and the parking lot was noisy outside our window. The hotel staff was unaccomodating and rude. They never called us back to rectify the situation. We absolutely do not recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for completing the survey regarding your recent stay at our property.   On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future.   I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.

Summary: Stayed here for one night prior to going to a concert at Spaghettini, Seal Beach.  Great location for both the concert and the overnight stay.  Room was on the top floor overlooking the pool.  I was told they had a balcony room for us but it was on the second floor and I preferred not hearing footsteps over my head.  If I had been staying longer, the only reason to get a balcony might be to smoke (which I don't and am not sure is allowed) outdoors without leaving the building - there is no view.  Room was clean and large with the usual amenities.  Bath is small but adequate.  The desk staff were upbeat, smiling, and conversational.  The breakfast is small but included hot items, making it easy to get on the road if time is a constraint.  The breakfast area was part of the lobby
Manager Response: Good morning, thank you for your review of your most recent stay with us. We greatly appreciate all our guest's feedback. We hope to see you again soon, have a great day!

Summary: This hotel offers very good value.  Breakfast is quite good and property is kept very clean.  Parking at times can be difficult. It is located close to restaurants and freeways.  I will stay here any times we are in the area
Manager Response: Good morning Van J,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us feedback for your most recent visit with us. We will strive to uphold the cleanliness that met your expectations during your visit. We hope to see you in the near future, have a wonderful day!

Summary: We were very satisfied with the large room and the helpfulness of the staff.  They went over and above the call of duty to be of assistance.  They were cheerful and professional both at the lobby as well as the service staff
Manager Response: Hello ANAMARIAANDRICHIE,  I always feel so blessed to have such wonderful staff, I am so happy to hear our staff went above and beyond for you during your visit. We will continue to provide you with that level of customer service and even try to top it during your next visit. Have a great day, thank you for your time!

Summary: This is the nicest Best Western we have been to in a while. The carpet looked new and was very clean, the TV was probably the largest I've ever seen in a hotel room, and the bed was pretty comfy. I would before than happy to stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Good Morning Dylan D., thank you for taking time out of your busy day to leave us some valued feedback. Thank you for noticing the renovated rooms, our team has done everything in their power to prepare the best available room for you and all our guests. Have a great day!

Summary Heading: Best Western Los Alamitos Inn & Suites, Los Alamitos, CALIFORNIA
Summary: I stayed for five nights and it was an easy location, very close to my work assignment. I ate dinner at five different diners that are all on the same street. it is a quiet location and courteous employees. The internet and AC worked well for my late night data entry needs. I enjoyed the grab-n-go breakfast in the early morning because I was not able to stay around for a hot breakfast. I am grateful though because that was my only source of food for several hours into my work day. Thanks!!
Manager Response: Good Morning Chad P,  First off, we would all like to thank you for your feedback. From the looks of your review, you were able to enjoy many of the amenities we share with our guests. We are especially happy to hear our grab-n-go breakfast bags were able to, at the very least, help you make it through a long work day. We know how important it is to fuel up for a work day, and how much of a positive impact even a snack can have on a busy work day. Have a great day!

Summary: This was by far the cleanest and nicest Best Western I've stayed in. The grounds and rooms were very well maintained and the staff was exceptional. Only complaint were that the pillows were very hard and the parking was limited and spaces were extremely tight. Other than that, I would definitely stay again, but with a much smaller car.
Manager Response: Good morning April,  Thank you for reviewing your most recent visit at our hotel, guest feedback is very important to us. If we may, parking toward the front of the hotel parking lot may prove beneficial for you when traveling in a large vehicle. But we appreciate your loyal and willingness to stick through the parking troubles with us. Have a wonderful day!

Summary: This was a good experience for my first stay at this motel. Given the recent price hikes in the area at other locations I was forced to stay here to meet my budget allocated by my client. I was concerned at first but overall this is a nice property with modern rooms. The bed was very comfortable and not to soft like other cheaper hotel brands and locations.  TV was large and had good picture quality. AC was great and powerful.
Manager Response: Good morning Greg S, Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to hear we exceeded your expectations for the Best Western Brand, we strive to provide superior customer care. We think our newly renovated rooms are wonderful, and we are glad to hear you enjoyed the room as well. Have a great day!

Summary Heading: A Great start to our Holiday
Summary: Great hotel and lovely staff.  Clean, quiet, comfortable and only about 20 mins away from Disneyland.  Walking distance to restaurants.  Beds were comfy and provided a good nights sleep.  Didn't get the opportunity to try the pool out but it looked very inviting.  Would have no problem in staying here again.
Manager Response: Good morning Karen T, Thank you for your review! Hearing our staff provided excellent customer care and met guest expectations always puts a smile on my face. Our team would like to thank you for noticing the dedication we have to our guests. We hope to see you again so you can try out our swimming pool and spa; additionally, feel free to call the front desk for more towels for the pool. Have a great day!

Summary Heading: Good Clean place for a good price in Orange County
Summary: Clean and very quiet rooms.  Close to where we wanted to be.  Good value.  Parking was a little challenging when full, but we would definitely book again.  The staff was very friendly.  Easy to find and centrally located.
Manager Response: Good Morning, thank you for reviewing your visit with us! We apologize for the parking issues, if problems ever arise for you, please inform the front desk so that we may assist you, as we do have alternative options for parking. Thank you very much for choosing our hotel for your visit, have a wonderful day!

Summary Heading: Comfortable and friendly while within price range
Summary: I found both the Best Western and the reception staff to be welcoming and knowledgeable.  Thanks for a lovely stay.  Loved the pool, wished the air-conditioning had been a little more realistic as to real temp but at no time uncomfortable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel and staff were great. The breakfast was very good. The only issue we had was the parking. Manager Response: none

I stayed here with my family for 4 days, and then brought my husband to this hotel.  He liked it.  It will be our come to hotel whenever we are in town.  We used to live in Long Beach, so when we visit.  It's perfect.

Breakfast was included and was good, but area is VERY small.  It also serves as the business center (desk with computer and chair).  No gym, small parking area with tight spaces, beware of entrance ditch, go very slow or you will scrape the bottom of your car.  The WiFi was terrible!  Service was very good, friendly people.  We stayed for two nights as it was central to our plans.

Summary: We rented the suite and were very impressed with quality and cleanliness. Overall the hotel was very clean. Only problem was the cooling system in living room section and no available parking when we came back at 11:00 PM.

Summary Heading: Convenient to Los Alamitos High School
Summary: We love to stay here when visiting family and attending the Los Alamitos High School choir events. Their location is convenient to Los Angeles and Orange County. The rooms have recently been totally renovated.

Summary Heading: Great Room and even better service
Summary: Very nice, clean room.  Jose, the front desk person, was friendly and extremely informative.  The parking lot is a bit small and hard to park a large vehicle but we made it in out family van. The hotel is close to various places as well as the 605 freeway which leads all over Southern California.  The pool and jacuzzi were very relaxing and a definite plus!  We're in the Los Alamitos area at least 3 times a year and will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review for us! We are glad to hear Jose provided you with excellent customer service, and that you were able to enjoy the swimming pool and jacuzzi during your stay. Hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Clean, convenient, but can be a little noisy...
Summary: I stayed 4 nights for a work trip and overall had a pleasant stay.  The room was clean and the bed comfortable.  Looks like they have been working on keeping the hotel up. If you're a light sleeper, the halls can be a bit noisy.  I suggest the third floor.  I stayed on the second and had a very heavy-footed upstairs neighbor.  Front desk staff was very friendly and helpful.  Breakfast was decent.  I just wish it started at 6 a.m. instead of 6:30 a.m. to make it more convenient for work hours.  Parking is a little tight, but manageable with a small car.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: We are glad to hear you enjoyed your most recent stay! We definitely strive for excellence so constant improvement is our goal, and we are glad you noticed. Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review for us, we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Our stay was descent, however, the second night we had noisy neighbors. The room was nice, but the parking spaces were a little narrow and the two rows were closer together than most places. It was challenging to get out of the parking space and required a couple tries of backing up and pulling forward to get out without hitting other cars. If we didn't have the use of the bigger handicapped space, it would have been even harder.
Manager Response: Hello Lori H!   Thank you for your review, we apologize that other guests were noisy during your stay, we definitely take noise complaints seriously. Hopefully we get to see you again soon to show you how we have improved based on your review!

Summary: Nice room with a very good breakfast.  Parking lot is a bit cramped.  Location is good and very close to various eating establishments and freeway.  Will stay again when in the area. Very little noise helped making sleep easy.  Television had many different channels.

Very well maintained! We have stayed at this facility 10 times over the past 4 months.

This past year we were coming often to assist my 100 year old mother in law in moving to assisted living, and an Alzheimer's facility. This staff always remembered us, and always asked how we were doing with kind thoughts and words. We truly appreciated that.  This staff is the best ever.

Summary: Staff was nice, rooms were nice and clean. My husband and kids enjoyed the free breakfast every morning. We stayed there for our Disneyland vacation, the drive there and back wasn't bad at all. Maybe 20 min, if that. Would definitely stay there again.

Summary Heading: A Great Hotel, no need to look further

The rooms are very clean, the beds are comfortable, wi-fi connection, HD tv with cable shows, and a free breakfast every morning with a very good selection of food choices. Summary: This hotel was great overall, very friendly staff and attentive to requests.  Their breakfast was excellent for our family.  Our room was very clean and spacious for our family of five; we had the “Junior Suite”.  We came home to a nice clean room every night as we visited local California attractions such as Knott’s Berry Farm and the Aquarium of the Pacific.
Manager Response: Thank you for such positive feedback. We are glad to hear that you had a comfortable stay. We hope to see you again in the near future! Thank you for your business, it is greatly appreciated.

Summary: The hotel itself is a bit worn and on a busier road but not noisy at all. When we checked in we were disappointed to see that it was a smoking room(didn't know there was such a thing) but the front desk clerk (Juan I think) was very apologetic but they were sold out so there was not much he could do. He did however try to do his best by giving us a 'smoke machine' to use to help decrease any lingering smells and offered to change the room when he had a vacancy again in 2 days.  It was not so bad so we stayed. Most impressive again was the staff at breakfast one day. My son has a food allergy and when asked for ingredients they regrettably did not have the box any longer for the french toast BUT the clerk and the lovely lady who was doing the breakfast that morning offered to
Manager Response: I am very pleased to hear that the breakfast attendant and myself could help. We do apologize for not having the box for the french toast still but glad the pancakes worked for your son. If you are ever in the area again and choose our hotel for your stay we will be sure that your son gets his french toast. From now on we will keep the ingredients section of the box! It's always a pleasure to have great guests like yourself. Thank you for the great reviews. We hope to see you again!

Summary: The staff at this hotel is very attentive and friendly. Room was clean and everything worked just fine. However, the main reason we chose this hotel was for the hot breakfast, and that was a little disappointing.  It was the same items every day - apples, bananas, oranges; Raisin Bran, Corn Flakes and Rice Chex for cereal; hard-cooked eggs, sausage and potatoes; and Danish pastries, blueberry and banana nut muffins. After the third morning we were all pretty tired of the breakfast choices. If another hotel were to offer more variety on their breakfast for a comparable room rate, I would book with them over this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your room and our staff. We also thank you for giving more ideas to help improve our hotel. I will definitely look into a different variety of breakfast items. We hope to see you again! Thank you for your business!

Summary: The bad: The sheets were a little old (little bumps in the fabric from washing but at least they were clean). The sink had a few hairs in it- super gross. Most rooms face the parking lot (very small and full), which can be noisy. Breakfast was pretty simple, but sufficient. And the TV remote was fairly unresponsive. Lastly, there was only a small bar of soap and a small bottle of shampoo. No conditioner or lotion.  The good: there's a liquor store next door and a taco shop across the street- that's all I really need. The rooms were mostly clean, and customer service was great. WiFi worked seemlessly. And you're not too far from the 605, so you can get anywhere fairly easily.   I'd stay here again on business, but it's not really a place I'd bring the family if we visited the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I will look into the detailed stuff that you noticed and did not like. Hopefully the next time around we could improve your stay if we are given the opportunity. Thank you for your business! We hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: Great staff, very dated and tired facility on a busy street, ugly neighborhood
Summary: The hotel staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful.  But the hotel was far from what we were expecting based on the web photos and reviews.  My first thought when I pulled in the driveway was "how did they make it look so good in those pics on the web site?"  My first thought when I saw the pool was "how did they make it look so good in those pics on the web site?"  It is on a rather busy street with a liquor store on one side and a motorcycle repair shop and a Southern Cal Edison transformer station on the other -- get the picture?  The immediate area seemed safe, but not exactly appealing.  Access to the most of the hotel rooms is via an exterior balcony walkway.  Anyone walking by could look right in to see you standing at the bathroom vanity doing whatever if the
Manager Response: Thank you for your response. We are going through renovations still and the exterior is actually being re-done this summer. Our interior was all redone in January of this year. We do appreciate your business and we apologize that our hotel did not meet your standards. I am pleased to hear that our staff made you feel comfortable. Hopefully we will have another opportunity to have you back at our hotel so we can try our best to give you a comfortable & pleasant stay. Thank you!

Summary: This hotel has been completely renovated. The staff is very nice and willing to help with any issues.  Breakfast is small but was filling. You can make your own coffee 24 hours a day. The location is surrounded by businesses but is close enough to highway to make it easy access to other areas. Well worth the money spent
Manager Response: On behalf of our entire staff I would like to thank you for such a great review. We do appreciate it, as well as your business! We hope to see you again sometime in the near future. Thank you!

Summary: This hotel is clean & comfortable. The rooms are spacious, and the bed was extremely comfortable. Great location midway between Orange County and Los Angeles International Airports with easy access to 2 major freeways. Neighborhood is safe with stores and restaurants within walking distance. Free WiFi worked well. The only downside-- the free breakfast was a little lacking, but still had all the basics. Room had both a microwave and refrigerator and great in-room coffee. The parking lot is a bit small, so if you are driving a large vehicle it might be somewhat challenging to get in and out of the spaces. Overall, a great stay and I will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for such great feedback. We are glad that we were able to accommodate you and that you enjoyed your stay. We appreciate your business and we hope to see you again soon! Thank you!

Summary: I wish was offered something for my inconvenience at check in, the front desk had a new girl and she didn't know all the P&P so that made my check in long and frustrating but the room was nice. Once we go to the room, we were happy because it was nice and clean. Most hotels offer something for your inconvenience but the front desk girl didn't. Once I got over the check in, i moved past that incident. I wish the hotel offered a better breakfast, it was very simple.  If your looking for a hotel that serves a nice breakfast or just basic...don't come to this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I apologize that your stay here with us wasn't up to your standards. We hope that if you were to come back we could make sure you have a comfortable stay with us. We do thank you for your business!

Summary: The Los Alamitos Inn offers a great value in a nice location.  We liked the friendly staff, great location and comfortable rooms.  There are many options in the area, but this hotel offers the best value for the money.  Stay here and save.
Manager Response: First off we would like to thank you for your business and for your feedback. I am very pleased to hear that you had good encounters with our front desk staff. They really do strive to provide superior customer care. I am glad that we could make your stay enjoyable and it would be a pleasure to have you back at our hotel. Thank you for your business once again. Have a great holiday weekend!

Summary: BW Los Alamitos was the best location for me on my business trip. The parking is a bit in adequate and some of the other guest a bit rough but over all it was a good stay. The lobby and breakfast area need some improvement.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and that the location of the park made it easy for you. We hope to see you again! Thank you for your business!

Summary: Not fancy, but a good night's sleep, clean, renovated guest room, small but refreshing pool for the kiddos and breakfast! Staff very ;peasant. We chose this hotel because it was very close to El dorado Park event.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We appreciate your business & hope we get the chance to have you at our hotel again! Thank you very much!

Summary: The staff are very friendly and helpful.  The room was quite spacious, I must admit we did have a corner room on the third floor.  In the regards to normal street noise it was very quite, however, there was someone next door to the hotel that apparently had been working on his hotrod and finally got it running at 2:30AM - UGH!  It was noisy, it was more than noisy it was awful.  AND, it was very inconsiderate.  The wasn't bad but I've had better.  The breakfast was ok, hard fried eggs (frozen then warmed), brown & serve sausage, pancakes or French toast (again, frozen then warmed), purchased hardboiled eggs, dry and hot cereals, juice and coffee, and fresh fruit (apples, bananas and oranges).
Manager Response: First off thank you for your feedback! We are very glad that you enjoyed your stay. I'm not so sure what happened but we do offer tea bags with hot water during breakfast so I wish we would've known before hand to try to make your stay a little better. We do appreciate your business & hope to see you again! Thank you!!

Summary Heading: Not a 2 Room Suite - Don't be fooled!
Summary: The 2-room suite IS NOT 2 rooms.  The 2nd room is small and narrow WITHOUT any venting for air or heat.  The bed is a pull out couch when pulled out you have NO ROOM for luggage.  The Staff were FANTASTIC and helpful - the room was nice and clean.  The parking was awful for a full-sized custom van.  Had to back out.  One driveway in or out.  Nice for cars and for 2 people - not for 4 adults and 2 kids in a "suite" that is not a "suite".
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We do apologize that there was confusion with the room type. The room type you actually reserved was a 2 queen bed suite and there was 2 beds in the room. The additional room is just a living room area that had an extra bed which is the pull out sofa bed. We did try to help and accommodate you with a roll-away complimentary but that was denied when offered and I also gave a discount for each night that you had stayed. There is no false advertisement on our website or through Best Western it does state what room type that room was and correctly with only 2 queen size beds. We do apologize for any inconveniences this may have caused we did try our best to make your stay as comfortable as possible. We do thank you for your business and once again we do apologize for the misunderstanding. Thank you!

Summary: The Best Western was very nice and a good value.  The room was quiet and clean.  Good family restaurants were nearby.  The room refrigerator had a small freezer which I need to preserve medicine.  From the motel is was a quick trip to airport.
Manager Response: First off we would like to thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback. We are glad that our property was convenient for you and comfortable. We hope to see you soon! Thank you for your business.

Summary: The location for us was great - we went out to Catalina Island and the ferry was only a 10-15 minutes drive from the hotel. Also the Queen Mary is the same distance - along with the Aquarium of the Pacific.  A lot of restaurants in the area, we also felt "safe" walking in the neighborhood.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that our location was perfect for you! We are hoping to see you again and thank you very much for your response. It always is great to hear a guest had a pleasant stay and enjoyed the hotel and our surrounding areas. We hope to see you again. Thank you for your business!

Summary: Since Hotels.com censured my review on their website, I'll repost here. Check-in and check-out could be quicker if there was more than one lobby attendant. Plenty of smoke-filled non-smoking hallways. Parking is adequate, but if you drive an SUV or full-size pickup truck, good luck parking that bad boy with their narrow parking lot. Room hasn't been dusted in months. Nice, quiet location. Convenient to amusement parks and CSULB. The continental breakfast is meager, yet well stocked. Disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will do our best to improve some of the things you have mentioned. Also, thank you for your business!

Summary: The hotel and the rooms were clean. We stayed in a suite.  Plenty of room and privacy for the three of us.  It was an excellent price.  The staff was very friendly.  The surrounding area is beautiful and the hotel is located next to eating and shopping.
Manager Response: It's all about cleanliness and location & we are pleased to know that you felt both were good at our location. We thank you for your business and hope to see you again sometime soon. Your feedback is appreciated.

Summary: This hotel is very nice but I think a little over priced for the size of the room and what you get. They also charge a $100 deposit at check in. booked a king room it was nice had a large tv which was a plus. The shower was updated too so it worked and wasn't all janky. Bath towels were a little small and seemed rather thin. Parking lot is narrow but there was always open spaces. Wifi worked pretty well for hotel internet. The mini fridge has no temp adjustment so it's always stuck at the lowest setting. the privacy latch was busted and the front door needs replacing and new weather stripping. Plenty of outlets! Even has USB outlets if you forget your wall plug. There was a breakfast but I did not go. Staff was pleasant and were quick to resolve the jacuzzi issue I had. I would
Manager Response: Thank you for your response! I am glad that our staff resolved the problems you did have. We hope to see you again and perhaps make your stay better than it was the first time around. Thank you for your business!

Summary Heading: Excellent service at Best Western Los Alamitos
Summary: The entire staff went over and above to make our stay comfortable. The hotel was very clean and well cared for, our room was in the back and very quiet. We had breakfast there every day for 6 days. We enjoyed the hot tub and outdoor pool. Our tv remote did not work well the first day and we were very pleased, it was replaced that very day. Recomend this Best Western highly.
Manager Response: We do our best to provide superior customer care & I am glad that you noticed that. Thank you very much for your business. It is guest like yourself that notice the little things that causes us to strive to do our best. Thank you for your business & we hope to see you again!

Summary: Awesome stay for the money. They have an outdoor pool and hot tub. They offer a complimentary hot breakfast; eggs, sausage, french toast, bread items, cereal, oatmeal, fruits, and pastries. Drinks include milk, OJ, coffee. Seating is limited though. There's a coffee machine available at all hours in the lobby - offers regular, decaf, mocha, and hot chocolate. A nice treat after a trip. Employees are always super friendly and helpful. Minutes away from tons of restaurants and stores, a few minutes away from El Dorado Park, 5 minutes away from Cerritos.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are very pleased that you enjoyed our property. We try our best to make our guest feel comfortable during their stay. We appreciate your business. Thank you!

Summary: Outstanding location for Disney Land and Knottsberry Farm.  Also the horse race track and Seal Beach for swimming.  Breakfast was well prepared and a nice selection.  Fine restaurants are nearby as are several fast food places.  Great shops within 100 yards on the same side of Los Alamitos Ave well worth your time to visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! We are glad that you took notice of how wonderful our location could be. I would personally say its a prime spot as well but hearing it from our guest is even better. Thank you so much for your business, loyalty, and positive feed back. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: This was my third stay at this location.  This is the only place I will stay at when I'm here.  If I can not stay at this hotel I change my travel dates.  The property and room are very clean.  All staff are very friendly and make you feel at home!  Close with a car to everything.   This hotel and staff should be the model for all hotels in the Best Western family.  Thanks again!
Manager Response: First off we would like to thank you for your loyalty. It is customers such as yourself that continue to come back and support us that make us treat you as family.. In which you are. We do like to treat our guests more like family because no one should come to a hotel and feel uncomfortable. Your loyalty and business means everything to us.  To hear that you only stay with us is AWESOME! We can assure you that we will continue to provide superior customer care. Thank you so much for such positive feedback and we are looking forward to your next arrival!

Summary: Best Western Los Alamitos recently renovated their rooms.  For us, it was especially noticeable in the bathroom and the vanity in the bedroom.  The staff was definitely interested in making sure our stay was pleasant and enjoyable.  Best Western also changed the breakfast.  Price was good for quality and service.  I plan on staying at Best Western Los Alamitos again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to hear that you had a pleasant stay & were happy with our entire staff. The changes in the breakfast seem to have been noticed and we hope you enjoyed the new breakfast vendor. We would be more than happy to have you stay at our location again if you are in the area. We can strive to make your stay more enjoyable each time. Thank you for your business!

Summary: I would rate this Hotel at 5 stars. Cleaning staff were excellent & consistent, front desk  employees were very friendly & helpful. Hot food could use improvement. And it would have been really nice if they had a laundry room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very pleased to hear that you had a pleasant stay with us. Our rooms were newly renovated this past December & we are glad that our customers are noticing the changes. As for our breakfast we are currently trying a new vendor. So far so good. We just moved to them last week. Hopefully if you are around the area and decide to stay at our hotel again you will notice the change in our food! Thank you again for your review and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: The reason for the low review?  Parking!  The parking is awful.  It's crowded!  Not enough space at all.  The rooms are a bit small.  The beds not so comfy.  Location is alright.  But I found myself saying "This is why I stay at Hilton Properties" several time during my stay.  You get what you pay for...
Manager Response: First off we would like to thank you for your feedback. Whether it is good or bad we love to hear from you so we know where improvements can be made. On behalf of our entire team we apologize your stay was not what you expected. If you were to stay again we would definitely try a different room selection for you to accommodate your needs. Thank you for your response & hopefully we can make it up to you.

Summary: Hotel is good my only problem was the security deposit compared to most Best Western properties. For me $100 is kind of steep which comes out to a total of around $225 for a one nights stay. Aster about a week your $100 will get returned to your credit card but if your limited on funds just be careful so there's no surprise. Other than that the rooms are newly decorated, very spacious, the linen is nice and clean, the water pressure is good. Full breakfast. Coffee,orange juice, water,  pancakes, sausage, flat eggs and fruit oh yea and danish rolls. In terms of value I have to mark poor because it's not average when it comes to other Best Western properties along with the location of the hotel. I would say average for BW hotel would be between $80-$100 when you start getting up
Manager Response: First off we would like to apologize for the inconvenience of our safety deposit that is required here at our hotel. Unfortunately it is industry standards that a deposit is required to be held by each guest. The only time the deposit being held is actually taken from you is if their is damages in the room, stolen items or smoking took place in a non-smoking room. We understand that this can be an inconvenience for many and we do apologize. We would like to thank you for your business and your review. Your input is important to us and we do try to do our best to satisfy each guest that stays here at our hotel.

Summary: Four of my family members stayed at Los Alamitos Inn and Suites for 7 days.  Would definately stay again.  Not a fancy hotel, but clean, very helpful workers and would rather spend my money in Caliofrnia on something I can bring back from this beautiful city.  Very, very easy to get into hotel and very safe area with many, many restaurants and stores in the area.  I lost my sweater and the helpful staff are sending it to me.  The breakfast was always hot, with eggs, sausage, bagels, waffels, boiled eggs, yogurt, pastries, juices, coffee, tea, hot chocolate, and fresh fruits........the lady on call Always kept the area neat and clean........bravo!
Manager Response: We are pleased to know that your stay here with us was enjoyable. We do our best to provide a comfortable stay for each one of our guests. We are glad you enjoyed our breakfast items as well and are pleased to announce that we are even upgrading to a bigger selection soon. Hopefully we will see you here at our property again if or when you are in the area. Thank you for taking the time and letting us know how your stay here with us was. We appreciate your feedback & business! Hope to see you soon!

Summary: I was pleased enough with the room I had in this Best Western property, but my misgivings about the parking and the quality of the breakfast prompted me to move. I really liked the updated room and the obvious investment that was made to upgrade the facilities. Unfortunately, I was so concerned about the security of my car and the possibility of door dings in the very narrow parking slots that I ended up moving. This property caters to the economy minded and the construction crowd. There are very few amenities. Breakfast was industrial at best. If the property could overcome the small footprint to ensure the security of guest cars, then this would be a true treasure. If you're in a company vehicle with little worry about what happens to your car, then this place is perfect. The
Manager Response: First off I would like to thank you for your feedback and thank you for your business. We are truly glad you noticed the renovations that were recently completed at our property. As for the breakfast we are currently working on getting a different variety of items to add to what we already have. We do apologize about our parking spaces and although we enough parking spots for each of our guests when the hotel is crowded it can be overwhelming. Our business consists of a small percentage of construction employees that stay with us regularly for the past few years. I do apologize about the inconvenience and we hope to make it up to you during your next stay.

Summary Heading: Great, super friendly staff, reasonable prices, good wi-fi, looked like they had nice rooms but we got the worst one :-(
Summary: We picked this hotel because of its proximity to family we were visiting and it was a toss up between here and the long Beach Marriott which was more expensive and did not include breakfast so we went for the budget option.  Our room had a lovely large bed, great shower and was a nice size but located under the archway to the carpark so even though there was a window, despite the sunny weather  it was impossible to see in the room by natural light even on the brightest day.  I hate artificial light so I found this rather depressing and made me feel as if I was living in a cave!  Also the noise from the carpark right outside our door was amplified by the tunnel/arch  way so very noisy and people coming and going early in the morning and late at night.  Also our coffeemaker made
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  I apologize about the experience that you had at Best Western in Los Alamitos.  We have been working on upgrading our coffee pots to single use and having more variety in breakfast items.  Unfortunately the rooms on the lower level at the carport do not see any sun and there is not much we can do to change this except upgrade your room and this was not an option during your stay because of the availability at the hotel.  We respect your choices but still would like to have a chance to make it up to you during your next stay.  We will take all of your feedback into consideration.  Thank you once again.

Summary: The staff was nice and the room was clean. The bed was extremely uncomfortable and the "Full Breakfast" was a joke. Be ready to go to Denny's or somewhere if you are looking for a real Full Breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us but I wish we could have met your expectations.  We recently went through a remodel with all of our rooms and the beds are an ongoing project that will be completed soon.  I am also looking into adding a few more items for breakfast and would love to hear suggestions. Thank you once again and we hope you will try us out in the future.

Summary: the rooms are clean very spacious   awesome television  big with time warner   location is perfect close to disney and beaches   its a perfect central location pizza place next  to it is really good   staff very helpful withy kids and all the troubles of travel dierctions and all
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us for your accomodation needs.  We hope to see you again on your next vacation.

Summary Heading: AN EXCELLENT HOTEL TO STYAY AT.
Summary: It was the best place we have stayed in during the last 5 years. although we have never stayed at Best Western hotels, we will be sure to consider Best Western in the future. Everything was excellent except the softness of the bed which was not as comfortable as in some European hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us here in Los Alamitos and I am very pleased that you enjoyed your stay.   WE hope to see you again soon and I will be updating all the beds very soon.

Summary Heading: Best Western Los Alamitos Inn and Suites
Summary: My husband and I stayed at Best Western, Los Alamitos for pleasure. We found the staff to be very receptive to our needs. They were friendly and accommodating. The room was clean, comfortable and quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Best Western Los Alamitos to stay for a getaway.  Our staff is here to accomadate you as much as possible and I am happy that you found our services helpful.  We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Coming from Germany and came back to the U.S. after five straight years, it really makes a lot of difference. But staying in one of the most coziest place like Best Western Inn in Los Alamitos, CA makes one stay a most memorable.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Best Western in Los Alamitos for your International travel accomadations.  We are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay and look forward to seeing you again next time.

Summary: hotel under r renos and the only floor left is he main floor and due to construction parking is limited but did not present a problem. Rooms very well done lots of room to stretch out. and décor classy but not overdone.  Breakfast was as usual for Best Western excellent quality well presented, Room was  clean and well lid out.
Manager Response: Thank you for your patience while we are under renovation at Best Western in Los Alamitos.   I am pleased that you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms and hope to see you again.

Summary: I was disappointed the rooms were open to an outside corridor.  I don't feel as safe and that the stairs were directly next to our room.  The room itself was large, but dimly lit.  The toilet had a leak and would run periodically thru the night, that was disturbing.  As well as a water waster when California is so dry.  The breakfast area was so small and cramped I was not impressed. Parking was a challenge, very tight spaces.  For the price $103.50 per night plus taxes, I did not feel it was worth it.
Manager Response: Although we do have outdoor corridor rooms we also have indoor corridor rooms.  Los Alamitos is a safe small town and the police  periodically come and check during the night.  We also actually have flushmates in all of our toilets that conserve water.  Unfortunately when they go bad we do have to wait to get the new ones for up to 48 hours. Thank you for taking the time to voice your concerns and we take every concern and suggestion so we may serve you better.

Summary Heading: Excellent, but kept awake by chirping smoke alarms
Summary: Excellent accommodation, breakfast. But I only sleep and eat breakfast at the hotel. The sleeping was poor because of an unspecified intermittent chirping. Sounded like few smoke alarms with a low batteries. Front desk said someone was coming to figure it out, but chirping did not stop after I complained.
Manager Response: I apologize about the noise that kept you awake all night.  We resolved the problem as soon as can be and would love for you to come back and visit our newly renovated rooms.

Summary Heading: Surprise, Surprise, this was really good for the money
Summary: We where on the road travelling through California, and based on my google maps, I came across this hotel, as it was just off the freeway, with shops in walking distance, and it seemed to suit us for a short stay  The room we got was a suite with a bedroom and living room, as it was the last one available. It was $10 more than a normal room. It was perfect for us. We booked the first night, but extended our stay by 2 more nights, as we found it in a good location for our needs during that time, and it was well priced  Our room was in the part that was indoor corridoors, whilst most of the other rooms had outdoor facing doors. I wouldn't normally book a hotel/motel like this, but was assured the suite was covered in, and it was. I just prefer inside doors for security  There is
Manager Response: We are very happy that you were able to find us during your travels.  I am pleased that you found our location convenient for your recent stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I have stayed here many times over the past 10 years.  Good location, quiet, comfortable,  great staff.. I have told many friends and family about it and they found it very good.  It is close to  Disn eyland and Knotts Berry Farm and easy drive to both.   There is an elevator, which you do not always find, and I need.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Best Western in Los Alamitos.  We are very pleased that your stay with us has always been great.  We look forward to seeing you again soon

Summary: the on demand service through time warner was amazing  looking to get same type of service for home   the sci fi on demand was great as well as a vcery clan nice pool   super location far enough from crowded beaches close enough to   harbor and beach
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay and I am very pleased that you enjoyed your time here with us.  We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary Heading: Review of Best Western / Los Alamitos, Calif.
Summary: We have stayed at this motel/hotel many times in the past.  We have always found it clean and well staffed.  The WiFi system some years ago did not work well, but since then as worked without a hitch.  One of the few hotels that offer a room with a walk in shower which for the infirm is a huge bonus.  When we stay in the greater Long Beach Cal. area, we would stay anywhere else
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay.  We have upgraded the wifi here at the Best Western and we will soon be remodeling our rooms as well.  We look forward to seeing you again very soon.

Summary: Excellent lodging and location to Knotts, Medieval Times, Pirates, Wax Museum and Disneyland also Long Beach attractions like the Queen Mary and marina.  Short drive to Ports of Call to see the U.S.S. Iowa battleship and marina.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us on your trip.  We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: After a long day, late flight to LA, bags, rental car, and a drive towards San Diego, this was the perfect location for us to stop.  We had an issue with Siri trying to find the place, but fortunately, the non tetchy one of us had printed directions.  :).   Does that redeem me dear?  One oddity of a late night checkin at this hotel is that the lobby us locked.  You have to check in around the corner at what I'm convinced is an old drive up window with a hotel now attached.  But we got checked in.   The exterior elevator was right behind us, and up we headed for 217.  Nice modern key card unlocks on the door, and inside is a really nice surprise.  It's not a new building, but it has been updated with nice new furniture, fresh paint, a nice flat panel tv on the wall,and updated
Manager Response: Thank you for your time to let us know how your stay was here in Los Alamitos.  Our hotel will be going through a remodel at the end of September to the middle of October where we will be renovating all of our rooms including furniture and carpets which should help in updating the hotel.  I will keep your comments in mind about our eggs and see if we can find a different variety.  Thank you once again for choosing Best Western and we hope to see you again so you may let us know how our new and updated rooms look.

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel several times over the past 10 years but  this time we discovered it was getting run down and they are now renting rooms by the hour. The registration was all messed up and the cleaning crew was eating lunch in our room when they were supposed to be getting it ready for us. We needed to get ready to attend a wedding and ended up having to insist on them giving us a room that was already cleaned!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your experience at the Best Western in Los Alamitos.  We will be remodeling all of our rooms here at the Best Western in Los Alamitos in the month of September and October.  I also would like to reassure you that we do not sell rooms by the hour. But, we would probably give this location a try next time, hoping for a room with a better bed.

Thank you once again.

Summary: While checking in late, the clerk behind counter was VERY friendly, explained to me where breakfast was, told me where my room was located. Very friendly staff. I did not like the fact that this hotel is right next to a liquor store. Not that I am against drinking but I did not like the crowd it attracted. There was a "party" room on the first floor, 5-6 males drinking with their doors open and being loud. I went to get water at the liquor store and one followed me, very drunk.   On another note, breakfast was delicious, clean and included some sausage and potatoes. A plus for me.   I slept completely through the night! Beds are comfortable. Room is semi-updated but it was overall just a basic room. Excellent channel selection on the flat screen if you like watching TV.  I

Summary: Was very comfortable. Great location. Great staff. We enjoyed our stay. Loved how close it was to everything. Could walk to many locations. Quick drive to others. If we are in this area again, we will stay at this hotel again. We like Best Western.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us and we are very pleased you enjoyed the location of our hotel.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Clean rooms, good service. Staff was a pleasure to deal with. The facility was very clean and maintained. Was always asked if we needed any thing and if they could help. Only have 2 recommendations first  the eating area could be larger . secondly parking could be better.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response.  I apologize for the parking and due to summer conditions and occupancy our parking area can be a little tight.  We do have overflow parking next door to our establishment for our guests to be able to use during the evening and throughout the night.  We also offer trays for breakfast so our guest may eat there breakfast by the pool or in their room.  Thank you once again for choosing us for your accomodation needs.

Summary Heading: A little gem of a hotel!
Summary: We stayed four nights at this hotel and was very happy I chose this one.  The hotel is immaculate. The service is excellent and the bed was like sleeping on a cloud.  Definately worth the price. I do not have one negative comment.  How often can you say that?
Manager Response: Thank you for your time to review our property on-line.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The hotel is clean and comfortable.  The only problem is that parking is very limited.  I had to end up finding a place to park on the street.  Other then that it was a great place to stay.  We had to move out of our house for 3 days and we picked there because it was close to our home.  It was a good choice.. I would recommend it to my friends who come in from out of town.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to complete your review.  We appreciate your input and we apologize about the inconvenience for the parking that you had to endure.  We do have extra parking next door also for days where we need overflow parking at no extra charge.  We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: I spent one night here on business and the room was spacious and clean. The bed was comfortable and they kindly put me in the back of the property away from the main street noise.  The room was nothing fancy, but to sleep and shower, it was perfectly fine.  They had a nice breakfast spread and the internet was free and worked great.  There are plenty of restaurants within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to fill out a review for our property.  We wish to see you again very soon.

Summary: our stay at los Alamitos inn and suites was the best. hotel fresh lookingand rooms well appointed .location was perfict for our stay not more than 10 miles to any of our destations. restrunts in area were very good tomes olace ,ketella delieand knottsberry farmtoname afew.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our establishment.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Our stay was very good, great service.  However, didn't have enough roll away beds to accommodate our 13 year old he slept in the floor.  Hotel is also outdated needs some remodeling.  Overall great stay!  Very enjoyable!
Manager Response: I apologize about the inconvenience of not having a rollaway during your stay.  We had a large group and we have a limited supply of rollaways.  We will be having a remodel later this year.  I hope to see you again so we can exceed your expectations.  Thank you once again.

Summary Heading: Very accomodating for traveling with large team
Summary: Was in town for collegiate archery nationals. Our team needed four rooms. Entire hotel was booked by other colleges. Had a good time. Staff was very accommodating and made check in and out very smooth
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Best Western Los Alamitos for your group needs.  I am happy that you had a good experience here and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel twice and each time I received very good service, the staff is very accommodating. They are always trying to help you with all of your needs including arranging for taxis and shuttle services. There is a full breakfast and the staff makes sure that the items are replaced.
Manager Response: We appreciate your time and effort in completing a review.  Your review is very important to us and I am pleased that you received good service from our hotel.  The staff here at Best Western in Los Alamitos are striving to make all of our guests feel at home every day and we wish to see you again very soon. Thank you once again.

Summary: Nice Motel in a good area. lots of restaurants within walking distance, Sizzler, Subway, Mexican, Donuts, Liquor Store, Barber Shop. All very close. Also, this Best Western is located close to Eldorado Park Estates, which are some very upscale homes in Long Beach. The location is central to everything, so you can drive to the Beach, the Freeway, or Shopping. This Best Western has a clean pool and jacuzzi. Excellent value, I will stay here again!
Manager Response: I am pleased that our location met your travel plans accordingly.  Our location is walking distance to a lot of very nice restaurants which makes it convenient for all types of travelers.  Thank you for taking time to post a review and we look forward to seeing you once again.

Summary: This hotel was close to my Client's location.  The property is all that a business traveler could ask for...great rate, comfortable bed, fast internet, good breakfast and GREAT service.  If you need to be in the Los Alamitos area, I'd recommend over the much more expensive properties.
Manager Response: Our hotel is very centrally located for the business traveler in the Los Alamitos area and we will keep striving to make our business guests feel comfortable and be as efficient as possible.  Thank you for taking time to acknowledge the staff and hotel here in Los Alamitos.

Summary: The room I had is nothing special, but for a one-night stay to go to a conference at CSU Long Beach it was fine! It was quite spacious, had a desk and a flat screen tv that worked well, and the bed was comfortable. The shower was good.The breakfast was a step above the typical continental breakfast at many motels, though they were out of one of the 3 hot items (eggs, sausage, french toast) and when I went back for more coffee it still hadn't been replaced. The coffee was better than average. No problems at all.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to post your review.  Your feedback and satisfaction is very important to us and I will be using your feedback to implement ways to exceed your satisfaction in the future.  I do know first hand how important hotel comfort and is.  I apologize about the coffee situation and we do have a new coffee machine in the breakfast area for your convenience that is available at breakfast and 24 hours a day for all of our travelers.  Thank you once again.

Summary: I've visited other hotels in this same stars level that looked a lot nicer, but a plus on this hotel is that is clean, does not smell and is orderly. The food needs a lot of improvement. The personnel was courteous and professional. The pool/sauna are very small and do not look inviting. The facilities in general are average. Good for a short trip on a budget; however, I recommend eating somewhere else.
Manager Response: Thank you for your your review and comments.  We take every comment very seriously and we have acknowledged your remarks and added more items to our breakfast menu.  We are also looking forward to our remodel later this year to make your stay more enjoyable.  I appreciate all of your input and will continue to make Best Western Los Alamitos as comfortable as possible for all of our guests.

Summary Heading: Great hotel but a little pricey
Summary: Very clean and up to date rooms.  Staff friendly and helpful.  Thought price was a little high for motel type building. I'm very picky about where I park my car and the parking spaces seemed small (I have a small truck) and not  a lot of them.  Also there was no place for a hand towel at the sink.  All towels were in the toilet/shower area.
Manager Response: We are looking forward to  a remodel later this year and I will take your suggestion into consideration about the bath towels.  I apologize about the parking situations but we have recently made the compact spaces larger so it is easier to get in and out of spots and also have extra parking at night next to our hotel.  I thank you for your review and I will use the feedback given to us to implement improvements.

Summary Heading: Very Good Value in Los Alamitos
Summary: Convenient to Knott's Berry Farm.  Recently renovated.  Very clean and well run.  Friendly, helpful staff.  Breakfast was very good and included french toast, sausage, eggs, and fruit. Fortunately, breakfast was not crowed. Be sure to request room away from the busy highway on which the hotel is located.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! So very happy to hear that you have noticed our renovations. I must say that has changed most of our customers perspective on our hotel. On behalf of our whole team we would like to thank you for your business. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: This hotel is very close to Knott's very farm (about 4 miles).  It is also close to Seal's Beach.   You can walk down to the beach and then afterwards stroll along main street downtown.  There, you can shop and go to various resturants.  We went to Seafood Resturant and had a very delicious meals.  I had Sword fish, my wife had seafood salad and my son had Fish & Chips.  They were all good.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback! Location is key and we are glad that you speak to highly of our location. We try our best to provide superior customer care so we thank you for your feedback on our hotel. Hopefully we see you soon! Thank you for your loyalty!

And we barely fit in the parking space. We didn't receive any email or any previous information about it, and was told there was no discount for the inconvenience.  The "breakfast room" was a little small, but the breakfast was good. As far as I know, there was no exercise room or laundry, and the pool closed kinda early, 9 pm.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your feedback. Unfortunately during the month of your stay we were still undergoing renovations. If you are in our area again anytime soon we hope to have you back at our location and we can try to provide you with a much better parking situation. Thank you for your business & your feedback. Hope to see you soon!

Summary: We have stayed here over 10 times while visiting family nearby. It is a friendly, helpful staff. This time around there was a little more noise from upstairs then usual and the bed and pilllows are getting lumpy (but then, so am I, age does that). The cleaning staff is always great and professional, next time though, we will get a top floor room. Recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback! We are glad to hear that you are one of our loyal guests! So we would like to thank you for your loyalty. We apologize for the noise that you experienced during your past stay. The month that you stayed with us we got that quite often unfortunately and it was because we were going through renovations to have brand new rooms. Rooms were being gutted from top to bottom. So once again we apologize for the noise. As for your next visit all you have to do is request a top floor room and we should be able to accommodate your requests. Thank you for your review once again and we hope to see you soon!

If we go back to this area we would look for a different hotel.

We've also changed our breakfast vendor and our guest seem to love the new changes that have been taking place on our property. We do respect your opinions but would also like another chance when in the area. Thank you for your feedback it is greatly appreciated.

Summary: We stay here because of the convenient location which is half way between our departure point and our destination in Portland OR. On this trip the desk clerk suggested and excellent restaruant in the town of Woodland.  I hope we can find it again on our next trip.

Summary Heading: Great stay in time of need

We would love to have you stay with us again but this time it'll feel like a whole new place.

Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I am glad to hear that my front desk staff was on top of your shower issue. I must say our staff we have is great. Our rooms are brand new from top to bottom...Furniture, bathtubs/showers, carpet, decor...etc. If you are ever back near our location we would love to have you again to see our new and improved hotel. Thank you for your business!
